divs: Sighting Detailsabout 9:00 pm southeast of Breckenridge, Tx i saw one light that was stationary that would be dim then suddenly glow bright white. the light was not moving because i was keeping the light lined up with a group of trees. suddenly, at 9:20 pm a triangle appeared glowing white bright lights and just as sudden, disappeared.....
Summary: saw bright lights in shape of triangle southeast of Breckenridge, Tx on 05-04-10
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Breckenridge
There were no other sightings in Breckenridge on or around May 4th 2010
